Welcome to active_mri's documentation!
==================================================
``active_mri`` is a package that lets you apply reinforcement learning techniques to solve active MRI
acquisition problems.

.. automodule:: rl_env
    :members:

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
